name: Memoria Pictura
description:
Welcome, wandering artist...

An old, blind adventurer commissions you, a wandering artist, to recreate his wondrous experience in a mystical forest. With his fantastical story to guide you, it's up to you to recreate this fading memory with the tools you have.

A journey that starts with immortalizing an experience that ends with a realization that perhaps life is truly worthwhile enjoying the present rather than chasing fantasies.

(And remember, if you want to share your artwork with the world...please do! The world deserves to see what you've created.)

• • •

Nobongo - Project Management, Programming, Narrative Design

aw225 - Narrative Design, Programming Assistance

DianeDesign - 2D Visual Artist, UI/UX, Sound Design
